generated_caption: The statistic shows the annual personnel costs of the water transport industry in Cyprus from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the water transport industry had personnel costs of approximately 35.6 million euros .

In 2018 , health and well-being index for Bosnia and Herzegovina was 80.4 index score . Health and well-being index of Bosnia and Herzegovina increased from 34 index score in 2002 to 80.4 index score in 2018 growing at an average annual rate of 3.41 % .

As of December 2020 , the average daily number of new COVID-19 cases in Italy amounted to 5,135 . During the same period , around 5,100 new cases were reported every day . The peak of new infections was recorded on March 13 , at 9,126 .

This statistic presents the distribution of the total amount of debt owed in the United States as of 2013 , based on debt type . In that year , credit cards were the largest source of debt , representing 57 percent of the total debt .

The survey showed that 34 percent of the respondents in the Czech Republic would not have any objection to having their data collected by the government in order to prevent terrorism . In comparison 27 percent would not mind their data being collected to prevent crimes . Only 17 percent were against the government collecting their personal data to protect them against theft or fraud .

The COVID-19 ( COVID-19 ) pandemic in the United Kingdom ( United Kingdom ) began in March 2020 , when the first case was identified in a man who had recently traveled to Italy . As of March 25 , 2022 , there have been over 6,500,000 COVID-19 cases and around 145,000 coronavirus related deaths in the UK .

This statistic shows the annual change in the number of people employed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014/2015 , by sector . In 2014/15 the manufacturing sector saw a decrease of 22 thousand full-time jobs .

This statistic shows the value added of the financial services industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2020 . In 2020 , the added value of the financial services sector amounted to approximately 118,550 million euros .

This statistic illustrates the results of a survey on the distribution of the total number of employees in the Italian retail trade in 2015 , broken down by type of store . During the survey period , approximately 40.2 percent of the employees in the Italian retail trade were employed in small stores , while around 35.3 percent were working in big supermarkets .

In January 2021 , the average price for a one-bedroom apartment in the city of Vancouver , Canada , was about 1,198 Canadian dollars . This is a 3.7 percent decrease in price from the same period in 2020 .

This statistic shows the annual value added of the information and communication technology ( ICT ) services sector in France from 2010 to 2018 . ICT services value added peaked at 108.3 billion euros in 2016 .

The statistic depicts the share of adult Americans who have ever used the online dating website or app Plenty of Fish in 2015 , by ethnicity . In that year , 30 percent of white respondents said they used the website or app Plenty of Fish .

The most important Chinese New Year holiday period for travelers in 2020 , was from February 14th until the 16th . In 2020 , the Chinese New Year holiday period was extended to 10 days . The Chinese travel and tourism industry was severely impacted by the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak during this period .

This is a statistic showing the annual change in international price of crude oil and petroleum products from 2004 to 2017 . In 2017 , the international price of crude oil and petroleum products increased by 12.32 percent compared to the previous year .

In 2020 , the total number of air passengers in Germany amounted to approximately 45.6 million , a slight drop compared to the previous year . The highest number of air passengers was recorded in May 2020 , with around 1.5 million air passengers flying that month , compared to 1.3 million in the same month the previous year .
The number of active users on Facebook in the United Arab Emirates grew from 1 million in 2014 to 1.5 million in 2018 .

This statistic presents the average retail price per unit of the first and second generation iPads in the United States from 2010 to 2013 . The first generation iPad was priced between 549 U.S. dollars and 730 U.S. dollars in the first quarter of 2011 . By the second quarter of 2013 , the average retail price was around 554 U.S. dollars .

The most common type of crime in the United Kingdom in 2020 , accounting for 31 percent of all offences , was theft . The most frequently recorded property offence in 2020 was theft from a shop , with 12,289 cases .

This statistic displays the share of people with a disability that are employed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of 2015 , by disability . 21 percent of respondents stated that they had a disability and were unemployed at the time of survey in 2015 .

The statistic depicts the share of Americans who are willing to pay for an app with in-app purchases in the United States as of June 2015 . During the survey period , 42.5 percent of respondents stated that they were willing to pay for an app with in-app purchases .

This statistic presents information on the most popular types of digital content that are purchased by consumers on a weekly basis in the United States as of April 2015 . According to the results , 36 percent of respondents stated they purchase digital content weekly .

This statistic shows the percentage of people in Scotland that were very happy or quite happy with the fire service between 2015 and 2019 . The figures represent the results of a telephone survey conducted in Scotland between March and November 2019 , where 82 percent of respondents were very happy with the Scottish Fire and Rescue Service .
This statistic shows the number of U.S. employees of United Airlines from 2004 to 2018 . In 2018 , United Airlines had 82,599 employees .

This statistic depicts the number of video games released by Italian video game developers worldwide in the period from January 2009 to June 2020 . The number of video games released in 2015 was 110 .

This statistic shows the percentage of children aged 12 to 17 years that had been in a relationship in the past year in England in 2016 , by gender . It was found that 35 percent of boys aged 12 to 17 years had been in a relationship in the past year .

This statistic presents results of a survey conducted in 2019 , asking Canadian consumers what they would be willing to pay more for in their grocery shopping . During the survey , 25 percent of the respondents stated that they would be willing to pay more for organic products .

The statistic shows the number of reported cases of cholera in the Dominican Republic in 2020 , broken down by province . In 2020 , there were a total of 121 cholera cases reported in the Dominican Republic .

In 2020 , the highest paid female athletes in sports included tennis player Serena Williams , soccer player Alex Morgan , and golfer Lydia Ko . In the same year , male tennis players dominated the top ten list of highest paid players , with Serbia 's Novak Djokovic leading the pack .

This statistic displays the share of responders in the U.S. who had ever used a sign language interpreter for health services in 2019 , by income . During the survey , it was found that 38 percent of respondents with a household income of less than 200 percent of the federal poverty level had ever used a sign language interpreter for health services .

This statistic shows results of a survey on the water intake from the faucet for the last 24 hours from respondents in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015 . During the survey , 14 percent of respondents reported to have had no water intake from the faucet for the last 24 hours .

In the fiscal year ended March 2020 , the net profit of Japanese company Kobe Steel was approximately 30.4 billion Japanese yen , down by approximately 11.4 billion Japanese yen from the previous fiscal year . The operating profit of the company was 11.858 billion Japanese yen , down from 14.497 billion Japanese yen .

The graph displays the daily average price per square foot of office space in London from the first quarter of 2020 to the second quarter of 2021 . During the presented time period , average daily rents decreased by 2.27 percent .

The number of nights spent by international tourists visiting the United Kingdom ( U.K. ) has decreased since 2020 , with the majority ( 53 percent ) of visitors spending three nights or less . In 2020 , 22 million international tourists had stayed for three nights or less , a 2.4 percent decrease from the previous year , and 16 million tourists had stayed for seven nights or more , a 12.7 percent decrease .

The statistic depicts the most popular types of food and drink in the United Kingdom ( UK ) according to respondents of a survey in 2013 . 22.8 percent of respondents said that they prefer to eat or drink chocolate , while 14.7 percent said they prefer to eat or drink crisps .

This statistic presents the annual turnover of the accommodation and food service activities industry in Slovakia from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 the accommodation and food service activities industry had a turnover of approximately 1.18 billion euros .

This statistic shows the annual turnover from the wholesale and retail sale of food , beverages and tobacco in Malta from 2008 to 2016 . In 2016 the annual turnover of this sector amounted to approximately 1.248 billion euros .

This forecast shows Whole Foods Market ' s annual revenue from 2006 to 2018 . Whole Foods Market is an American grocery chain that sells organic and natural foods . Its headquarters is in Austin , Texas . In 2015 , Whole Foods Market generated revenues of 15.7 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic depicts the percentage of respondents in the U.S. who agreed with the statement that "the government should do more to protect Americans from online privacy threats in 2015." 44 percent of respondents agreed that the government should do more to protect them .
This statistic depicts the number of reported measles cases in Canada from 1965 to 2019 . According to the data , a total number of 216 measles cases were reported in 1990 .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic has had a significant impact on the health sector in the United Kingdom , with many nursing staff and healthcare professionals working to prevent the spread the disease . This statistic shows the percentage of nursing staff in the United Kingdom reporting a high degree of difficulty in getting to work during the first quarter of 2020 , by age . In that quarter , 25-34 year old nursing staff were most likely to report a high degree of difficulty in getting to work , with 68.7 percent of this group stating that they had this problem .

In 2021 , the most popular online video game in France was FIFA 22 . It was played by nearly half of the online gaming audience in the country , while the second most popular game was League of Legends .

In 2020 , approximately 1.1 million employees were employed in the European pharmaceutical industry . The number of pharmaceutical workers in Europe is estimated to have increased in the last few years , with a peak in 2018 , where approximately 1.13 million workers worked in the pharmaceutical industry .
The statistic shows the crude death rate in Jordan from 2005 to 2020 . In 2020 , the crude death rate in Jordan was at about 42.21 deaths per 100 population .

The majority of the respondents of the survey conducted in 2017 in Germany thought that the country had not been able to prevent terrorist attacks in the past 12 months . Only around 4 percent of respondents stated that terrorism in the country had not been a concern at all .

The total number of people who died in the 2019-nCoV virus outbreak as of April 11 amounted to around 92 thousand . As of March 31 , 2020 , the number of deaths in China from the coronavirus outbreak stood at 1,092 , as the country was still battling the disease and implementing lockdown policies . The number of coronavirus deaths in China has decreased since then , with the most recent figures from April 8 showing the total number of deaths from COVID-19 in China at 990 .

The statistic shows the number of establishments manufacturing electronic and electro-mechanical equipment in Canada from 1998 to 2016 , by province . In 2016 , there were approximately 1,210 establishments manufacturing electronic and electro-mechanical equipment in British Columbia .

The statistic displays the results of a survey among French people about the most used social networks in 2015 . According to this survey , 62 percent of the respondents stated to use Facebook on an almost daily basis .

According to a survey , the majority of respondents in France , Germany and Italy would not like to see their children playing football . The French , in particular , were not in favor of this type of sport , as only 29 percent of French respondents would allow their children to practice it .

In 2020 , value added in construction for Viet Nam was 44,526 million US dollars . Value added in construction of Viet Nam increased from 2,338 million US dollars in 1971 to 44,526 million US dollars in 2020 growing at an average annual rate of 6.44 % .

This statistic shows the number of employees in the manufacture of plastic products industry in Finland from 2008 to 2015 . During this period , the number of employees remained relatively stable , fluctuating between 2,020 and 2,060 people .

This statistic shows the total power consumption in the Netherlands from 2000 to 2015 , in terawatt hours . It shows the total power consumption of the Dutch power system in terawatt hours . In 2015 , the total power consumption amounted to approximately 105 terawatt hours .

The statistic shows the leading coloring book authors in 2013 by number of books sold . In 2013 , Dover Publishing Group sold over 10 million copies of coloring books , which put them on top of the list .

The age distribution of the population in the Czech Republic in 2020 showed that the country had 3,102 thousand persons aged under 15 years and 2,604 thousand persons aged 65 years and older that year . In 2035 , the number of persons aged under 15 years in the Czech Republic is expected to decrease by around 30 thousand people to 2,764 thousand .

In 2020 , population aged 0-14 years for Timor-Leste was 1,001.62 thousand persons . Population aged 0-14 years of Timor-Leste increased from 854.98 thousand persons in 1971 to 1,001.62 thousand persons in 2020 growing at an average annual rate of 1.33 % .
The most popular sport in the United States as of March 2021 was basketball with 52 million players . Baseball and football had 50 and 47 million players , respectively .

The statistic shows the average duration of international passenger flights from the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2019 . In 2019 , international flights from London Heathrow Airport had an average duration of 7 hours and 12 minutes , with the longest international flight from Heathrow to Auckland in New Zealand lasting a little over 18 hours .
This statistic displays the number of visits to the dentist in England in 2019/20 , by gender . In this year , there were approximately 4.36 million visits by females to dentists in England .

This statistic shows the share of the general population in selected countries with a personal annual income over 100,000 euros , as of 2016 . In France , 0.17 percent of respondents had a personal annual income of over 100,000 euros .

The change in consumer confidence in the euro area ( EU ) from March to April 2020 showed a significant increase compared to previous weeks , but was still lower than before the outbreak of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) . The index was at 63.8 points in April 2020 compared to 49.9 points the month earlier .

This statistic shows the number of people employed in the manufacture of basic metals industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , there were around 51.3 thousand employees in the UK 's basic metal industry , a decrease compared with the previous year .

As of April 2020 , there had been approximately 1.3 million confirmed cases of coronavirus ( CoCoVid-19 ) infections in the United Kingdom , with a total of 68,755 deaths . The number of cases peaked on March 19 , with 20,692 confirmed cases .

This statistic displays a survey of the most popular types of children's wear among parents in Italy from 2012 to 2015 . According to a survey conducted in 2015 , 52 percent of parents said that they preferred to buy second hand clothes for their children .

The statistic presents the internet usage penetration among households in Brazil from 2015 to 2019 . According to the source , the internet penetration rate in Brazil amounted to over 70 percent as of January 2019 . This number is expected to grow further .

This statistic depicts the most popular mobile messaging apps in the United States in September 2013 , based on number of active users . In the given week 20 percent of the users of SnapChat were active on the app .

The most common types of injuries sustained by patients treated in emergency departments ( EDs ) in the U.S. in 2016 were falls , which accounted for 24.3 percent of all injuries . Falls also accounted for the majority of traumatic brain injuries , accounting for 40 percent of all such injuries .
The statistic shows the number of employees in the water transport industry in Sweden from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the Swedish water transport industry employed a total number of 2,522 people .
